name: part_003
file: tmp_≪-KAGURA- Dance of the Gods 3D LIVE≫ Hakos Baelz Birthday 2025 + ANNOUNCEMENTS! #BaeDDay2025 [viPlIHvk724]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Kaira'. Guest KANKAN and Hakos Baelz are on stage.
MC section where Hakos Baelz introduces KANKAN and they talk about the song and KANKAN's 3D debut.

subtitles.original: 僕の世話
subtitles.english: My care

subtitles.original: 傀儡になって飛び出すんぞ
subtitles.english: Becoming a puppet and jumping out

subtitles.original: 想像すれば全部採択
subtitles.english: If you imagine it, it's all adopted

subtitles.original: 雲間の威風は
subtitles.english: The majesty between the clouds

subtitles.original: 躍動して揺らして
subtitles.english: Pulsating and shaking

subtitles.original: 肥えた祈りの果てへと
subtitles.english: To the end of a fertile prayer

subtitles.original: 空しく虚勢
subtitles.english: Vain bluster

subtitles.original: 内面喪失終了
subtitles.english: Loss of inner self complete

subtitles.original: ぎこちなくも晴れ渡る様子
subtitles.english: Appearing to clear up, even if awkwardly

subtitles.original: 全て吹き飛ばせ
subtitles.english: Blow it all away

subtitles.original: 雲も魔も厄も
subtitles.english: The clouds, the demons, and the misfortune

subtitles.original: 躍動して揺らして
subtitles.english: Pulsating and shaking

subtitles.original: 肥えた祈りの果てへと
subtitles.english: To the end of a fertile prayer

subtitles.original: 響け雷鳴
subtitles.english: Resonate, thunderclaps!

subtitles.original: わああ！ KANKANさん来た！！
subtitles.english: Waaaa! KANKAN is here!!

subtitles.original: ...すごい激... (笑) 自己紹介お願いしていいですか？
subtitles.english: ...Such intensity... (laughs) Could you please introduce yourself?

subtitles.original: はい。えーと、歌い手として、そしてオリジナル曲も出したりしてる、えーと、歌い手のKANKANと申します。
subtitles.english: Yes. Um, as an utaite, and someone who releases original songs as well, um, I am KANKAN.

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: Please look forward to my work.

subtitles.original: わああ！本当に来てくれてありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Waaaa! Thank you so much for coming!

subtitles.original: もちろん、もちろん。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Of course, of course. Thank you.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます... もう、このままに... このままで話そう... 本当に...
subtitles.english: Thank you... Oh, just like this... let's talk like this... Really...

subtitles.original: 立ち... 立ちましょうか？ 本当にすみません。失礼しました。
subtitles.english: Stand... Shall we stand up? I'm so sorry. Pardon me.

subtitles.original: 本当にね、元々KANKANさんの大ファンなんで、本当に。
subtitles.english: Really, I've been a huge fan of KANKAN from the start, truly.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。光栄です。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you. I'm honored. Thank you.

subtitles.original: あの、ちょっとまあ、お恥ずかしい話なんですけど...
subtitles.english: Um, this is a bit of an embarrassing story, but...

subtitles.original: あの、KANKANさんの曲を初めて聞いた時、電車中にたまたまに流れたんですよ。
subtitles.english: When I first heard KANKAN's music, it happened to play while I was on the train.

subtitles.original: で、普通に夢中になってて、あの、降りるトコも乗り過ぎました。
subtitles.english: And I just got so absorbed in it that I missed my stop.

subtitles.original: おお！！ そんな夢中になって聞いてくれてたんですか？
subtitles.english: Oh!! You were listening that intently?

subtitles.original: 本当にめちゃくちゃ綺麗で... はい、本当に一緒に『傀儡』歌って、できて、本当に嬉しい！
subtitles.english: It was just so incredibly beautiful... Yes, I'm so happy we could sing "Kaira" together!

subtitles.original: こちらこそ本当に。素敵な機会をいただいて。
subtitles.english: Same here, really. Thank you for this wonderful opportunity.

subtitles.original: まさかこの『傀儡』を選択してもらえると思ってなくて。
subtitles.english: I never thought you'd choose "Kaira."

subtitles.original: まさかのチョイスなんですよ、自分的には。
subtitles.english: It was a surprising choice for me, personally.

subtitles.original: うわあ。でもね、さっきも必死で歌ったんですけども、KANKANさんの声ってさ、もうヤバイですよ、本当に。
subtitles.english: Wow. But you know, I was singing my heart out just now, but KANKAN's voice is just... it's insane, really.

subtitles.original: 恐縮です。
subtitles.english: You're too kind.

subtitles.original: で、なんとKANKANさん、これも3D初登場じゃないですか！
subtitles.english: And KANKAN, this is also your 3D debut, isn't it!

subtitles.original: そうなんですよ。もう全部が初めてなんですよ、今日。全部初めて。全部。
subtitles.english: That's right. Everything is a first today. Everything is a first. Everything.

subtitles.original: うわあ！その動き見せてくださいよ、もう。うわあ！ 3D、どういう感じですか？ KANKANを見ろ！
subtitles.english: Wow! Show us those moves! Wow! How is 3D feeling? Look at KANKAN!

subtitles.original: どういう感じ？
subtitles.english: How does it feel?

subtitles.original: え、やっぱりなんか、普段はライブ出る時は、やっぱり生身の体で出ることが多いんですけど。
subtitles.english: Well, usually when I perform live, I'm often there in the flesh.

subtitles.original: はい。やっぱり全然動き方とかも違うし、全てが新感覚で。おお、はい、ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Yes. But the way I move and everything is totally different, it's a whole new sensation. Oh, yes, thank you.

subtitles.original: いや、素晴らしい！ 楽しいめちゃくちゃ！ 素晴らしい3D世界へようこそ！
subtitles.english: No, it's wonderful! It's so much fun! Welcome to the wonderful world of 3D!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: で、あの... 来ました。はい。今回の『傀儡』っていう歌、一緒にあの歌ったんですけど、KANKANさんのオリ曲ですよね。
subtitles.english: And, um... here it is. Yes. We sang "Kaira" together today, which is an original song of yours.

subtitles.original: あ、そうです。私の、はい。柊マグネタイトさんに作っていただきました素敵な楽曲を、ぜひ。
subtitles.english: Ah, yes. It's mine, yes. It's a wonderful track that Hiiragi Magnetite created for me.

subtitles.original: いえ。あの、まあ歌詞がめちゃくちゃ難しいんですけど、あの...
subtitles.english: Yeah. Um, well the lyrics are incredibly difficult, but...

subtitles.original: そうですね。早口だし、詰まってるし、リズムが大変。はい。
subtitles.english: That's true. It's fast-paced, packed with words, and the rhythm is tough. Yes.

subtitles.original: です。まあちょっとあの、意味とか曲に関してちょっと聞きたいなって思ってるんですけど。
subtitles.english: Right. Well, I'd like to ask a bit about the meaning and the song itself.

subtitles.original: あ、もうなんか、『傀儡』っていうタイトルからしても、雷がついてるじゃないですか。はい！
subtitles.english: Ah, well, even from the title "Kaira," it's got lightning in it, doesn't it? Yes!

subtitles.original: もうとにかくみんなに、稲妻のような衝撃を与えたいっていう気持ちからで... ちょっとオーダーして、柊マグネタイトさんに。
subtitles.english: Basically, from the feeling of wanting to give everyone a shock like a bolt of lightning... I requested that from Hiiragi Magnetite.

subtitles.original: もう柊マグネタイトさんならではの、やっぱり迫力のある楽曲を作ってもらいたかったので。
subtitles.english: I really wanted them to create a powerful track, which is their specialty.

subtitles.original: で、その結果この素敵な楽曲を作っていただいたんです。
subtitles.english: And as a result, they created this wonderful piece of music.

subtitles.original: 素晴らしい、本当に。今後もね、一緒になにかコラボできて、本当に... あの... あ、もうぜひ！
subtitles.english: Wonderful, truly. In the future as well, I'd love to collaborate on something again... Ah, absolutely!

subtitles.original: 今日もう... もう言葉出ないヤバイ。どうしよう。すごい全力で歌ったから。
subtitles.english: Today I just... I'm speechless, it's crazy. What should I do? Because you sang with all your might.

subtitles.original: 本当どうしよう、本当に。もうファンの気持ちはこういう感じなんだなって。いや、本当にそう思って嬉しいまた。
subtitles.english: I really don't know. So this is how a fan feels. I'm just so happy once again.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: 今度一緒に歌って... できたら嬉しいと思います。あ、またぜひ。お願いします。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: I hope we can sing together again. Ah, definitely again. Please. Thank you.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。あとみんなもね、あのKANKANさんのチャンネルとかどうぞ、もうぜひ見てみてください。あ、もうぜひぜひ。いっぱい良い曲あるんで。
subtitles.english: Thank you. Also, everyone, please go and check out KANKAN's channel and everything. Ah, please do. There are lots of great songs.

subtitles.original: いや本当です！ 本当、実... 本当に言わせていただきます。すべて良い曲なんで、聴いてください本当。
subtitles.english: It's true! Honestly... I'm telling you. Every song is great, so please listen to them.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。ぜひよろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: Thank you. Please do.

subtitles.original: And overseas fans as well, uh, this is KANKAN.
subtitles.english: And overseas fans as well, uh, this is KANKAN.

subtitles.original: Please check, please check the channel out. They're amazing.
subtitles.english: Please check, please check the channel out. They're amazing.

subtitles.original: もう、こと... 言葉出ないよ。ごめん... KANKANがえごく... えぐいから。
subtitles.english: I'm speechless. Sorry... KANKAN is just too amazing.

subtitles.original: I'm like a deer in headlights right now.
subtitles.english: I'm like a deer in headlights right now.

subtitles.original: I'm such a big fan of their work, so please do check them out.
subtitles.english: I'm such a big fan of their work, so please do check them out.
And...
